siyalu jathinta ethuma yukthiya gena denu atha. 2 ethuma us handin katha karanne wath, moragasanne wath natha; withiwala asena paridi handa nanganne natha; 3 thalunu bata dandak kadadamanne natha; niwi gena yana pahan thirayak niwadamanne natha. 4 sabawin ma yukthiya itu karanne ya; ethuma kalakirenne wath, adhairya wanne wath natha; mihi pita yukthiya pihituwana thuru ethumage daham manga udawana thuru diwayin bala sitinu atha.'' 5 ahas thalaya mawa, eya pihite wu da polo thalayath ehi hataganna siyallath nirmanaya kala wu da ehi wasiyan hata pana nala dunna wu da ehi yana ena sathunta jiwaya dunna wu da dewi samindano mese wadarana seka: 6 ''yukthiya pihituwana pinisa samindanan wana mama numbaa kandawagathimi.

dan janawari 10, 11 dina deke me pilibandawa parlimenthu wiwadaya awasanaye doshabhiyoga yojanawa pilibandawa parlimenthu thiranaya yanu atha.me kriyadamaye awasanaya wanne 107/21 anuwa parlimenthuwe bahuthara sankhyawak wisin sammatha karana lada yojanawak janadhipathiwaraya wetha idiripath kirimen pasu janadhipathiwaraya wisin kerena niyamayakin ee winishchayakara waraya iwath kerenne ya.winishchayakarawarayakuta wiruddhawa idiripath kerena doshabhiyogayakadi kriyathmaka wana wyawasthanukula kriyadamaya meyayi. 1984 di newil samarakon agawinisuruwaraya sambandhayen da eya kriyathmaka wiya.
